thread.title: EDUCATION FUND
thread.title_full: Hodges Badge Company, Inc reviewed by EDUCATION FUND

author: EDUCATION FUND
title: EDUCATION FUND
text: We needed custom rosette ribbons for an event that was a little over a week away. Their customer service rep was really professional and helped us put our rush order in. When the ribbons arrived, they were beautiful and perfect! Thank you!
